channel.title: A Few Questions & Brusing up On My Coding
channel.description:
[center][size=17pt]Questions[/size]
[b]~~~[u]Teleporting Problem[/u]~~~[/b] When ever i seem to teleport in my new server (because my old server had a lot of errors/viruses/lag) it seems it wont teleport me When ever i try to teleport it will take me to my location but somehow it will keep me little but i want to stay big instead of having to log out constantly because of some error (it gets very annoying) [u]Example[/u]: [img]http://img441.imageshack.us/img441/8674/littlefellany4.png[/img]
~~~[b][u]Summoning[/u][/b]~~~ OK , I Absolutely hate summoning in my server it lags the hell out of every one in my server , i have tried for ages looking for tutorials on removing this but i have seen none. does any one know how to remove the full thing please port your links bellow if its the link to the tutorial.
~~~[u][b]IP Ban[/b][/u]~~~ i have a thing i made in my server.java that makes them ipbanned but not in the way yours will work because if u normally ip ban some one it will let them on in a new acc but i can only do m new code in a text doc so I'm gonna need the ipban code for this to totally rock so if u have the ::ipban code post it bellow but u have to know that most of your ones that you will post will be wrong and it only kicks them so i need the actual ipban code.
[size=15pt]End Of Questions[/size]
[size=17pt]Brusing up On My Coding[/size] [b]~~~[u]Items[/u]~~~[/b] Ok , You have all seen those items wizzard (g) top and SplitBark that dont look correct and you can see your actual appearce under the cloths i used to know how to get rid of this so you can wear them and see the full item but i have now forgot can some one give me a example of what folder it is and where how i can do it.[/center]

item.title: A Few Questions & Brusing up On My Coding
item.dc:creator: @legendzpker legendzpker
item.description:
@legendzpker wrote:

[center][size=17pt]Questions[/size]

~Teleporting Problem~
When ever i seem to teleport in my new server (because my old server had a lot of errors/viruses/lag) it seems it wont teleport me When ever i try to teleport it will take me to my location but somehow it will keep me little but i want to stay big instead of having to log out constantly because of some error (it gets very annoying)
Example:

~Summoning~
OK , I Absolutely hate summoning in my server it lags the hell out of every one in my server , i have tried for ages looking for tutorials on removing this but i have seen none. does any one know how to remove the full thing please port your links bellow if its the link to the tutorial.

~IP Ban~
i have a thing i made in my server.java that makes them ipbanned but not in the way yours will work because if u normally ip ban some one it will let them on in a new acc but i can only do m new code in a text doc so Iâ€™m gonna need the ipban code for this to totally rock so if u have the ::ipban code post it bellow but u have to know that most of your ones that you will post will be wrong and it only kicks them so i need the actual ipban code.

[size=15pt]End Of Questions[/size]

[size=17pt]Brusing up On My Coding[/size]
~Items~
Ok , You have all seen those items wizzard (g) top and SplitBark that dont look correct and you can see your actual appearce under the cloths i used to know how to get rid of this so you can wear them and see the full item but i have now forgot can some one give me a example of what folder it is and where how i can do it.[/center]

Read full topic
item.source: A Few Questions & Brusing up On My Coding
